alert.note: Alert for Schoolcraft (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 16 at 11:03AM EDT until further notice by NWS Marquette
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM EDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by snowmelt continues. * WHERE...A portion of central Upper Michigan, including the following county, Schoolcraft. * WHEN...Until 800 AM EDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1051 AM EDT, gauge reports indicated Rapid snowmelt is occurring and will continue to cause flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Manistique and M-94 between Steuben and Manistique. - www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
